review_text:
We absolutely loved our stay here! Kati was a wonderful host, very kind and responsive. Our trip had some last minute changes and she was flexible and understanding in our check in/out times - we appreciated it so much!
The airbnb itself was so sweet and cozy, us and our dog loved the peaceful, quiet property and watching the chickens and deer! Definitely coming back to this lovely spot next time I'm in town :)
Kati was wonderful and it was the perfect stay for me and my fur baby on our way to Santa Fe.

Thoroughly enjoyed our first experience of glamping! The Flower Hut was charming and quirky and it was lovely to see three elk resting in the garden on our arrival and to be woken by the sound of the cock crowing.
Kati is very sweet. The place was peaceful and quiet.
Beautiful location

This place is so adorable. It was great. It was clean and just perfect for someone on a budget. This was our first Airbnb and Kati made it a great experience. We had trouble with hot water for the shower and she immediately came to help us out. The hut doesn’t have ac but it has plenty of windows for air circulation and she even gave us a fan to use. We also got to see two does which was nice. The wifi was great and the portable bathroom was clean as well. Only cons are the outside shower could use a bit more privacy since it felt like the neighbors could see you. Also the little wall way was bit narrow. Sink inside the hut only had cold water.The parking spot she originally wanted us to park was to narrow for rav4. Even with this conns they felt like you could work around it. Kati really did make our stay great and honestly would love to come back. Plus the bed was amazing to sleep in. Kati is also extremely responsive and did an amazing job accommodating us! Definitely recommend it.
Clean and unique

This was a great airbnb! I had to go to Durango, Colorado for a 2 day work trip & this was the perfect place for me to stay. Kati is very kind, helpful, & responsive. The flower hut was very cute & perfect for a lonely traveler like myself. Would definitely stay here again if work brings me back to the area.

If you want to be away from the hustle & bustle from busy, hectic life...then Kati's place is ideal. Living on a farm myself, I felt right at home with her friendly chickens, and beautiful calm quiet surroundings.
advice: when you pull up, your beautifully decorated, lovely art work filled private little hide-away is located FRONT OF the PROPERTY, to the LEFT. Not the building or house right up front or the home in the far back. Just stay L- not hard to find. Thanks Kati for the clean porta-potty!
note: folks, if your wanting hotel-style extras, close to shopping & restaurants, look elsewhere. But if you crave-peace, nature, back to basics...then I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS HIDDEN LIL GEM‼️
Very cozy relaxing space to stay in. Great value for money.
Great spot!
Wonderful place to stay. Very peaceful, relaxed and close to Durango. I will stay again next time I'm in the area. Love the outdoor shower.

Katie was quickly responsive and thoughtful. The room was just as described. Nice selection of coffee and teas.
The outside shower is fun and kind of edgy, early in the morning. The chickens are entertaining. The rooster is noisy like all roosters. That is his job. And I grew up on a farm, so it didn’t bother me!

Be prepared for the porta-loo, and know that the outdoor shower requires a little ingenuity, and is not for the highly modest. The room is charming and comfortable, and we enjoyed being wakened by the rooster. This truly is glamping, and so much more fun than a generic room somewhere.
Great stay! Cute place and the chickens are lovely to wake up to!

kati was a wonderful host. the chickens were a nice change from my city life and just awesome to hang out with. an amazing glamping experience for sure! the moon was full so it was hard to stargaze but it was truly beautiful being in the countryside like that! everything was a short drive away.
Super cute!
Kati’s place was beautifully done! It was a fantastic glamping experience - nice and comfortable. She was communicative and friendly.
Great communicator and very accommodating. Cute and cozy 1 bedroom.
Super cozy, there are a ton of friendly chickens in the yard as well!
super cute place super comfortable very much enjoyed our stay Katie is great!

Kati was awesome! We ended up arriving with soaked clothing from Red Rocks the night before. She was gracious enough to allow us to use her washer & dryer so we were able to travel on with clean clothes. Thanks Kati & Rupert!

The flower hut is a place I will definitely be returning to if I am ever in the area again. The small space is cozy and very welcoming. The host, Kati, is also very sweet, responsive and proactive. I highly recommend!!
Place was perfect for a quick stay and close enough to Durango city.
Awesome place highly recommend!
Cute getaway, would definitely recommend for warmer summer months. If you go in winter/fall/early spring be sure to bring extra blankets!

great little place was quite and cute...loved taking a shower outside...stayed for a week price was very reasonable...we enjoyed our honeymoon there...she even put chocolate covered strawberries a bottle of sparkling cider and a bouquet of roses for our celebration on her...thank you
A cute stay close to Durango. We had a great night and nice morning. Clean, nice inviting, and just the essentials. Would recommend for "glamping" near Durango
the stay was great!
We had such a wonderful stay at Kati’s! Such a cute little home filled so much love and art. Perfect for our stop on the way to Santa Fe :)
This was such a cozy and comfortable stay! Wish i could have stayed longer and will definitely be back! And Kati is a super wonderful host , as well!
Beautiful little getaway conveniently located
Very nice and quiet place. The hut was lovely decorated and the outdoor restroom was very clean (which is an important point). We appreciate our stay.
Very relaxing; great grounds and outdoor shower! Excellent value for the money and thank you for accomodating last minute!
A perfect nights rest. Thoughtful touches and delightful atmosphere.
Perfect little spot for a weekend in Durango. Cute and comfy.
Such a perfect little space! Perfect for a couple getaway. It has everything you need for a simple night away.
what can i say? charming? delightful? thoughtfully appointed? cozy? i adored staying in this sweet, sweet spot!!!
super cute cabin, very cozy and easy to find!
This place was so cozy and comfortable. Will definitely stay here again!
Great stay. Very friendly and communicative. Would recommend and stay again!
Lovely place to stay! Unique and comfy, great outdoor space and privacy. We went into town and back with no issues and hosts family was gracious as ever. Would recommend!
Great find! Cozy little spot just outside of Durango. Would stay here again.
Wonderful! Cute little hippy place, exactly as the description says it is. Wish I could have stayed longer!

Kati is a great host - once you book her place you will know why she’s a super star. I did not have the pleasure to meet her in person unfortunately, but I definitely enjoyed the stay and hope to stay again. The place is exactly as described. Funky and cozy. Comforter is so soft and she even left tea and goodies for the guests - so sweet! One thing I would like to note is that you do have to walk through a dirt path to the flower hub and the port-a potty is a bit of a walk too. Not a big deal unless it’s raining - just something to keep in mind.
A great stay in Durango! Definitely suggest to anyone
Everything was great! Wonderful location just outside of town. Kati had great recommendations and was easy to get in touch with. Definitely would stay again if I'm in the area.
It was perfect for what we needed - a good night sleep before our camping trip.
Adorable place. I look forward to a return visit.
The Flower Hut was perfect for our needs while visiting Durango, and everything was exactly as described in the listing. Definitely recommend for those looking for a low-maintenance stay!
This was a nice and cosy stay. You are right behind the main house but it feels private and comfortable .

It was a good location, country setting but close to town. Very quiet & peaceful, clean, it has what you need if you're not too picky as you do have to use a porta potty & shower outside but the path is lit to the porta potty & the shower is on back side of house & has curtains up for privacy it gets the job done for the price.
Nice quiet place to stay outside Durango with everything you need. Would stay again.
This is a cute place, very accurate pictures. The bathroom is about 50 yards or less from the bunch house but it’s well lit. The hospitality was superior.
Excellent! Highly recommend staying here.
We had a great stay! The studio was really cute, homey and clean. A quiet place out of the business of town, but still close to Durango to enjoy eveything nearby.
Lovely apartment with comfortable beds and lots of space. Only negative for us is that there is a separate rental above, and it was very easy to hear and hard to sleep through.
Very cute! Private- perfect spot if you want to be on the north end of town.
we enjoyed our stay great location to what we were trying to get to Megan was helpful and responsive when needed. I recommend and wel be staying again.

Meghan's place was awesome!! A quick and easy drive to downtown Durango, this spot provided just the right amount of seclusion from the bustle of town. A wonderful studio layout with such comfy furniture that was perfect for crashing after a long day. Would highly recommend!

Meghan’s basement apartment had all of the essentials and firm yet comfortable beds. If you’re looking for a no fuss, easy to access place to stay on a road trip, I would recommend giving it a try. Everything was clean and as described.
Location was perfect and the sauna a plus!
Great location and easy to walk everywhere with plenty of great food around!
Amazing location and property. Perfect spot to enjoy Durango.
We only stayed one night but very comfortable and beautiful place

This house was perfect for my family of four. There was plenty of space to spread out. The kitchen was fantastic and we enjoyed comfy living room at the end of the day to watch a movie on the smart tv. The location was the best part. Just steps from the Main Street of downtown but far enough to be quiet at night. We were there for a long weekend and always found free parking in the lot across the street. Would definitely stay here again the next time we’re in Durango!
We had a fantastic stay. The home was beautiful, beds were very comfortable and the location was phenomenal.

Location, Location , Location! It was so fun being close to downtown but still having the privacy and quiet of a side street neighborhood. Very comfortable common spaces, well equipped kitchen and comfy beds. The tight bathroom is somewhat of a drawback, especially for four or more people, but knowing ahead of time we knew what to expect. Really friendly host and very responsive to all requests.

Location was awesome, definitely within walking distance of a lot of restaurants and things to do. I left my wallet and the hosts were extremely helpful by letting me know it was left behind and allowing me to pick it up the next day. Had a great time and the house was super nice!

2nd time to stay there. Very comfortable beds Only issue is only 1 bath and it is very small. Should upgrade. Otherwise really nice place and Trent is really easy to contact ( best we have experienced)

The house is in a great location. walking distance to everything!
Everything is accurate in the description.
We will be back for sure!
Beautiful space and great location and easy access to downtown!
Lovely place. Clean, comfortable, modern kitchen. Very helpful owners. Superb location.

This is a very interesting house! It’s right in downtown yet there are very few immediate residential neighbors. It’s quiet yet accessible, right around the corner from shops and restaurants. The house is comfortable with a large and well-ordered kitchen, and a dining room table large enough to host a gathering of house guests plus a few more!! We would definitely stay here again if our paths bring us back to Durango.

We have stayed at Trent and Lauren's place a few times before. Location perfect. Everywhere we wanted to be downtown Durango is walking distance. Apartment has comfy furnishings, kitchen is well stocked with cooking tools and even family games for a fun night in! Hope to see you guys again next year!!
Great place to stay. Numerous restaurants within walking distance.

This place is great! We went on a couples trip for a birthday. The rooms are far apart enough to have some space. The kitchen was perfect size for cooking. And the best part was we were right in the heart of downtown. We walked everywhere we wanted to go and it was quick and easy! Not to mention the living room that outlooks to the snowy mountains beautiful!
It’s a special place and very convenient to downtown shops and restaurants. Easy walking distance. It’s a beautiful home. Lots of space and very tastefully decorated. We would definitely book again.
Very clean and walking distance to restaurants and bars

This place is perfect. You can park your car and not get back in it if you don’t want to. Everything is within walking distance, amazing restaurants, shopping, and the grocery store. Trent and Lauren are super responsive. I needed something early on a Sunday morning and I received a response within 20 minutes. I would 1000% stay here again.
Great downtown location, clean, lots of kitchen equipment. Great and convenient stay.
Perfectly clean, well maintained, everything new and in the best location in town.
Wonderful spot, very clean and cozy. The hosts are very responsive and the best of Durango is within a short walk.

This was a perfect place to stay in Durango, and we would love to come again! It has 2 bedrooms with the living room able to be used as a third if needed. There was plenty of space for our pack n play for our 2 year old.
The kitchen was amazing and huge, and I really appreciated the gas stove! The place has plenty of space.
We loved how easy it was to walk everywhere in downtown. Parking was a little tricky but not bad. The covered parking a couple blocks away was great our last night when it snowed. Also, it was a very easy drive to Purgatory to ski.
Highly recommend!
Great place for our family of 4 to stay while visiting Durango to ride the Polar Express. It was great being able to walk everywhere. Beautiful and cozy home.
This place was beautiful and cozy.
This is a prefect place to stay! I will stay there anytime I’m in Durango!!
Warm welcome. Easy instructions! Thank you

This house was great for our trip to Durango during Thanksgiving! It was good for our younger family of four, very clean, and well stocked. The gas range was very nice, and I was able to bring several of our traditional dishes to my brother's house for Thanksgiving dinner. The location was fantastic, and we pretty much walked everywhere. The hosts were kind, responsive and accommodating. My brother just bought a house in Durango, and I can see us staying here again to visit.

Good stay! Super close to the downtown strip with tons of food and shops. Hosts were extremely responsive. Beds were comfy. My van was too tall for the nearby parking garage, but there was free parking on the street about 2.5 blocks west.
My friends and I enjoyed our stay. The location was perfect!

We had a great stay at Trent and Lauren's rental! We loved how close it was to Main St and that we could walk everywhere we wanted to go including the Durango-Silverton train depot, out to dinner if we wanted, or for after dinner icecream. Lauren was extremely responsive and super helpful. I would definitely recommend staying here!

House is in a great location. Parking is challenging but to be expected in an old downtown area (Trent gives clear options for where to park). Kitchen is well equipped and we enjoyed the complimentary coffee and tea.
Beautiful, updated, and cozy space right in the heart of Durango. Great location and easy to walk to restaurants and shops on Main Street. We wanted to stay longer!
Perfect location. Very clean and easy to get into. Thanks for letting us use your place!

Sweet place. Loved the location. Wish it had more mirrors to get ready in since there was only one bathroom and it was difficult to get ready. Also lighting was difficult because it was to dim. The parking was a hassle (like others stated) but we would stay again if it is just husband and I. Thank you hosts for sharing your sweet home with us.

This was a great place in an ideal location. Everything was very walkable from the location. Trent’s place was very clean and I can tell they thought through every detail. There is a unit above that is also rented out, but the white noise machines help block out the noise from footsteps above. I really appreciated the communication from the hosts! They were very kind and responsive to questions about the area and the space.
Beautiful home in a great location.
Updated historic home with lots of original charm... a few quirks, but to be expected. Great location! We were able to walk to restaurants, shopping and the train station. Great communication.

All of downtown Durango right outside of the door! Walk to countless coffee shops, restaurants, shopping and VIEWS. Throughly cleaned space, soft bedding, my favorite is the absolutely endearing kitchen. Friendly hosts, we would love to stay here again.
Wonderful location, literally steps from the Main Street of Durango. Kitchen is large and has everything you need to make a meal away from home. Definitely recommend
Great

Beautiful home in a Great location. The home was very spacious and very clean. It was in a great location, only one block from Main Ave. where there were many restaurants and shops. The only drawback about the home was the parking: there is no parking at the home. The hosts do provide paid parking but it is 3 blocks away. Even so, I would definitely stay here again. The hosts were very quick to respond with questions we had and were very pleasant. Great property, great location, great value.
Great location in town and a beautiful home with a good-sized space. Parking can be a touch difficult but Trent has gone out of his way to provide clear options and directions.
Cute place and close to downtown. Enjoyed our stay.

If you want to stay close to Main Avenue this is the place. Left the car in it's free parking spot 1 block away during my stay. Very smart remodel whilst maintaining the original feel. The front room is very cozy for uninterrupted reading time. Loved it!
I traveled to Durango with my adult son and this was a perfect set up for us. Everything was clean and functioned well for our needs. Great location!
Great location ...cute, comfortable house...we enjoyed our stay
Awesome location in downtown!

The perfect location for our girls weekend. 1/2 block from Main Street where there is a wide variety of great restaurants and shopping. The house was also perfect for our group of 3. The beds (and sheets!) were very comfortable and every room had a sound machine! The kitchen was well stocked with everything we needed and the living room (which turns into a 3rd bedroom) was very cozy. Trent was quick to respond to a few things that came up which was much appreciated. A great spot for sure!

This place was awesome! Right downtown and walking distance to the train and all the best restaurants!
The house is very well finished, spacious, free of clutter, super clean, and the list goes on!
If you’re looking for an awesome place to stay in DT Durango just book it… you won’t regret it! 😊
Great quick stay for our family.

Perfect location, literally less than one minute from everything! Cutest house with the utmost attention to detail, and SO much character - modern, yet holds on to the history of the house. The owners are very responsive, and the info provided was detailed and informative! Thank you for a great stay!!
It was a great stay and location!
Great stay in Durango! Loved the downtown location that made it easy to walk to nearby restaurants and shops! Very cute, clean house with everything we needed. 10/10

Trent and Lauren were fantastic hosts! Very responsive when I had questions. The kitchen was nicely updated with everything you need. The house is in a perfect location and walkable to everything on Main Street and the Animas River Trail.
Fantastic spot, right off the downtown strip. Loved our stay and the location.

This home was very clean, the kitchen was a dream with everything we needed including ice of all sizes!
The location couldn't be beat with a fun bar and live music just down the block. My kids loved having their own space.

The place was great. it was super clean and had a beautiful view of the mountains. The neighbor had dogs that startled us, and could easily jump the fence. The neighbor was not friendly at all either.

I felt like a local while staying at Trent's place! It was right in the thick of things in Dorango and was beautifully furnished and appointed. It was clean and comfortable. I would definitely stay there again!
No complaints whatsoever! Super cute little casa. Kitchen was really nice! Clean and stylish! Love how close it is to all the bars, restaurants and shopping.
Great house right in downtown! We enjoyed walking to coffee every morning

First of all, we love this little town of Durango. Our stay at Trent’s place was in the heart of the most adorable downtown I’ve ever seen. It was walkable to almost anywhere we wanted to go. Great selection of restaurants and coffee. The home was well furnished with a beautiful kitchen! Very clean and matched the description. Worked out perfect for our needs throughout this trip! Would recommend.
We really enjoyed our stay. Great place and great location! Trent was really clear and helpful with everything. Would definitely stay here again.
Always a great stay ! Great hosts and wonderful location! We love this place !
such a wonderful spot right in town, really felt at home
Wonderful place my friends and I enjoyed ourselves

This property is in an excellent location right around the corner from historic downtown. It is updated and very clean. The beds are comfy with great pillows and linens. However, don’t expect to get in one second early. The door lock is on a timer and will not open until the exact check-in time. (I suppose you don’t have to be flexible when you have a great place in a great location.)
Great space to rent to be in downtown Durango. The unit was comfortable and well-equipped to host a family with young kids!
A great spot, perfectly walkable. Clean and comfortable. The place in fact feels larger than the pictures convey

For Durango, this location is perfect. It’s situated literally steps from the main drag, with walkable access to all the shops and restaurants.
As for the space itself, it was very comfortable, clean, and cozy. All the amenities you’ll need are there, and everything was modern and updated. Trent was very responsive as well.
There are only two “cons” I would mention, (and they’re not deal breakers):
Parking is a little complicated (the reserved spaces are a block or two away), but that comes with the territory when the location is so convenient.
The front steps can be a little treacherous in icy weather, as the gutter empties directly onto them.
Either of these shouldn’t be a major issue unless a member of your party has difficulty walking.
Other than that, a very pleasant experience, and definitely a recommendation from me.
the space was very inviting. It felt like home. the beds were comfy. the kitchen was very nice. love that could walk to nearby stores
Cute place, exactly as described. Very clean and had everything we needed. Location was excellent - restaurants and shops all walkable. Hosts also very responsive to questions!

This was a lovely home right around the corner from Main Street, putting you just far enough from the hustle and bustle that the home is very quiet and relaxing inside. But, you are steps away from restaurants, a winery, bars, and shops. The home was built in the late 1800s but it has been beautifully remodeled with an open kitchen and dining room space, and a very comfortable living room. The bookshelf has many great book titles that I wish I had had time to sit and read during my stay.
Great place. Only issues tv sound had bad echo and heat was could not be regulated at the house. Perfect location very clean will stay again and recommend to friends

This house is in a perfect location. Easy walk to restaurants, to the train station, to shops. The home was beautiful and clean and had everything we needed. I missed that it didn't have a washer/dryer, but we were just fine without it. Beds and bedrooms were comfortable. Make sure to pay attention to the parking instructions!
Fantastic hosts! Our favorite stay in Durango. Perfect location to walk to great restaurants and shops.

Trent and Laurens place was FANTASTIC! The location was a very easy walk to MaIn st and restaurants. Being that close i was worried about noise, but it was silent! Many confortable amenities, comfy bed and couch. Sleeps 6 so we could have brought our family, but this trip was just the 2 of us (no kids!!) Friendly and communucative hosts. Would absolutely stay here again!
The space is beautifully appointed, tasteful, spacious and comfortable. Easy walking distance to the heart of historic downtown.

Amazingly remodeled and close to downtown. Great Wi-Fi and Netflix is accessible as well as apple air play if u want to stream something to watch from your phone. I appreciated the white noise machines as well in each room. The parking spaces are a few blocks away but other than that, it was a great stay! Hosts are prompt to respond and friendly.
clean, cozy, and cute little place. loved our stay

Trent's place "Main Street Retreat" was perfect for our ski trip to Durango/Purgatory. We stayed in the downstairs apartment and found the location to be very walkable to the main street of Durango. We were close to restaurants, breweries, and shopping. The hosts were able to provide us with some great recommendations. They were super responsive when we may, or may have not, tripped a breaker in the middle of a blizzard. They quickly came out in the poor weather to access and fix the issue that was present. They were responsive to us throughout the booking process and the stay. I cannot say enough good things about them. 10/10 would recommend.

Great little spot!
Cute. Quaint. With gorgeous mountain views. Close to everything in their little downtown area. Even the people in the town were helpful/resourceful and had a good vibe about them.
The home is inviting and has warmth. Was plenty of room for myself, my boyfriend, my teenage daughter and her boyfriend. We each had our own space. Loved how close it was to purgatory ski resort too.
Thanks for having us!! Would stay here again, maybe next time I’m the summer😉

This was absolutely one of our most favorite vacations! We loved that we felt at home while in an area we had never been before! The location is perfect and the home is beautiful and cozy! We can’t wait to go back!!
Great location! Easily walkable to most everything. Place was clean, cute and cozy. Kitchen had everything we needed and we really appreciated the selection of games!
Perfect location for a downtown visit! Walking distance to restaurants, shopping, and train station. Very convenient and comfortable.

Trent and Lauren’s place was clean, in a great location, and very easy to find. Check in was simple and easy! I would definitely recommend their place! If I come back to Durango again I am staying at there place again!

This is our second time here- once in the upstairs unit, once downstairs- both are outstanding places to stay- clean, comfortable, walkable to all of downtown. would stay in either place again in a heartbeat
Great place to stay
Ideal location, great amenities, easy check in/out, clean and awesome hosts! Highly recommend. We will stay again!

Located in downtown Durango, across from City Hall, and within walking distance to everything that is Main Street Durango- eateries, shopping and the train station! My two teens walked over to the nearby ice-creamery a few times (which is a must try). Reserved parking is a few blocks away. Otherwise, there is metered parking directly in front of the home and free parking across the street at City Hall during designated times.
Contemporary renovations with a beautiful kitchen, plenty of hot water, a comfy separate lounging area to relax with family for games, movie night, or to read a book.
Books and a variety of board games are provided. Standard kitchen amenities, hair care products and dryer, and extra pillows and blankets are available. It is part of an upstairs/downstairs duplex, we were downstairs. The way it is designed you really do not encounter the upstairs tenants although you can lightly hear them walking around.
Trent is excellent at communicating and has a good response time too.
Overall, we had a great stay and would definitely stay again!
We really enjoyed our stay. Great location for spending time in town. Would definitely stay here again!
Nicely located near coffee and hot springs
Great place, great location, great host!
Loved the downtown location! We thought this was a place with good value and enjoyed having a good kitchen available for use.
Wonderful place with a great vibe and the location is awesome! Trent and Lauren are great host and quick to respond. Highly recommend!

This house is a gem! The location is great - steps away from all of the downtown shops and restaurants. The house is clean, comfortable, and well-supplied. Trent and Lauren were very easy to communicate with. Durango is a fun town to visit, especially with the beautiful fall colors!
This is a very nice place, centrally located in downtown Durango. We will definatly book again when returning to Durango.
Trent’s home is lovely. It is comfortable and very clean. The location is an easy walk to Main Street. We would highly recommend this home.
Really ideal location downtown, walking distance to all the shops and restaurants. Just a short ride to the trails, too. Super clean and freshly redone, very comfortable.

The Retreat was better than expected and Trent is a superhost for sure! The house was convenient to everything in Historic Durango. The decor was inviting and modern - with a bit of old rustic vibes. My family had everything we needed for a wonderful stay on our first trip to Durango. We would highly recommend them to book a stay - we had a great time based on some of their suggestions!
Great location and stay. The place was well furnished and stocked. Perfect for a family of four for a long weekend. Lots of great restaurants and shopping seconds away.

This place is fantastic! Clean, cozy, great layout and space, perfect location downtown (we walked everywhere), and strong internet (both my husband and I were able to work remotely on video calls). I would definitely stay here again!
Great hosts. Went out of their way to make the stay wonderful! Thanks guys!

GREAT communication!
Durango is BEAUTIFUL.
We booked this place after an unexpected event led us to leave Farmington, NM last minute.
One night was all it took to fall in love with the beautifully remodeled space.
Clean, modern, cozy.
We were so eager to check in that a small hiccup in the check in process almost crushed our dreams. However, the host was able to assist us and it was worth every penny!
Parking is a bit tricky but you don’t even mind since everything is walking distance. The host gives you detailed instructions on where you are able to park!
You can’t beat the views from all the around the home.
Beautiful kitchen, well- equipped, and just an overall cozy space.
I loved it so much, I am planning my next trip to Durango and I hope to be given the privilege of renting this space out again.

Great place a short walk from downtown. the parking is slightly inconvenient, but in no way the hosts fault. The spots reserved are only a few minute walk away and wasy to find. Very comfortable and cute home.

We're already dreaming of our next trip to Durango and staying here! The house is beautiful, well laid out, beautifully designed, clean, comfortable and everything you can imagine. But the location - wow. We were steps from Main Street but still quiet and private with great parking. The owners are also wonderfully responsive! We originally were considering a less expensive Airbnb spot but the second we walked in, we knew we made the right choice. Thank you for the wonderful stay!!!
Great spot for anything downtown!!
Trent’s place was super clean and great location. Instant communication as well. Perfect for a Durango visit.
Perfect spot in Durango. Easy check in, nice home and very convenient.
A lovely place in a great location.
Great Location. Very Clean. Wish there was a washer/dryer but not a big deal for only 1 night. Overall, the stay was very nice!

If you want a perfect location for Durango... this is the place. If you want a place that is clean... this is the place. If you want great communication and ease of checkin/checkout... this is the place. The pictures are representative of the home. Couldn't ask for a better experience. When I am back in Durango, I hope this place is available because I would love to stay again. :)

This place is fantastic! I had been to Durango several times and loved this place the most. The location can't be beat. Easy walking down to Main Street and easy walking to explore the incredible architecture in the old Durango neighborhoods. We never even got in our car during our stay. The place is beautiful! We ate out every meal (great restaurants in Durango) but the kitchen was big and nice and would be perfect for cooking in. It has a large dining table and island. The 2 bedrooms had super comfortable beds and the bathroom was great too. The house also has an extra room that is used as a TV room with a couch. For sure could be used for sleeping. Very spacious home! Loved every single thing about it. Definitely one of the best AirBNB's I've stayed in! I'll be back 100%!
Really enjoyed our stay. Easy walk to downtown.
This apartment was exactly as pictured. Clean, spacious, and 1 block off Main st. Did not want to leave!

A wonderful stay in Durango!
We came to town for the train trip to Silverton and back, and this home was in the perfect location, only about 6 blocks away from the station. The home was lovely and clean and perfect for us 3 adults and one child. Spacious and well stocked kitchen and bath. Smelled lovely in the entire home as well.

The refrigerator door had so many useful things when having take out or cooking for yourself. I enjoyed the peaceful early morning light and making coffee. The shower head is one of those amazing top end that feels like one is under a waterfall. I wouldn't expect that in a shack! I'd love to come back every year. Loved it! Terry

Stayed here for a wedding and it was the PERFECT place for a weekend getaway! The space was more than accommodating for two people and it was in a beautiful location. Loved being able to open the windows and let the fresh air in. Absolutely plan on staying again when in Durango for a weekend☺️
Fantastic stay! Highly recommend!
Great location! Peaceful and charming!
Enjoy my quiet evening.

This is a gem of AirBnBs! Remote, rustic and quiet but close enough to town for essentials. The BEST shower head 🤗, spotless everywhere and thoughtfully stocked. 6 out of 5 stars! (And the pups are the sweetest!) Thank you!
Loved the place, great for a quick 1 night stay !

Libby's place was the perfect location for the event I was in town for. Cozy well maintained, and provided all the amenities I needed. I will definitely stay here again, the next time I'm out of a race.
This is an eclectic little shack that was exactly as I expected. A nice little place to stay and unwind for a few days. Loved the stream and the private outside area.

It was a joy to stay at this little piece of heaven. Best night sleep after sitting outside enjoying the sounds of nature.
Great communication, lovely place to enjoy and if I’m ever in the area again I will be reserving this peaceful shack again.
Thanks Libby for a great spot to lay my head for a restful night sleep after a day of motorcycle riding.
This place was perfect!

We loved our stay here! Although the space is a tiny house it doesn’t feel that small at all, with a thoughtfully laid out design and decoration. The host was proactive with informing us about the WiFi being down, but the service in the area is great so we didn’t mind at all! Thank you for a lovely stay!
This was a nice stay very close to town. The hosts had lots of thoughtful touches and amenities.

We really enjoyed our stay and liked that the location was just out of town near a nice walkable park (Dalla Mountain Park). Location was nice, quiet and very clean! Would recommend to anyone staying in the area.
Great little place in a good location. Has all the comforts of home, and is clean, quiet, and cozy.

The accommodation is ideal: fully equipped kitchen, adorable decor, and refreshing exterior. All ideally located near Durango and all the wonders to visit around. A nice stay, thank you for creating this beautiful place.

We loved staying here! The spot is a tiny cabin just a few minutes outside of town in a beautiful setting. There is a yard with a table and chairs, a rocking bench, all located next to a very relaxing creek. We arrived just after a few days of camping, so the size was perfect for us. The place was clean and cozy. I would stay here again, for sure.
Lovely little shack in a great location. Very comfy bed and has everything you need. Nice creek to sit by and a private outdoor area to cook/eat. Really glad we chose this spot.

This is the second time I have stayed at MaeBunny shack. I absolutely love the location. It’s quiet and peaceful yet close to everything you need. I’ve always felt safe here as a solo female traveler. Me and my pup had a great time staying here.

We had a wonderful stay at Libbys place! very clean, tons of kitchen amenities, and very comfortable bed.
Thanks for having us Libby! :)

We really enjoyed maebunnys. It's only a few minutes from downtown Durango and from the Colorado trail. There's a kitchen so if you want to cook you can. The creek outside was peaceful. They left us coffee and snacks which was really nice.

This place exceeded all expectations. Sitting right on a beautiful little creek with a large private side yard and funky covered space with a wooden porch swing, the outdoor space alone was awesome. (Sitting outside listening to the rain on that tin roof was divine!) The "Bunny Shack" itself is adorable, inside and out. It's positively dripping with character, and Libby's thoughtful decorating with an eye toward comfort and delight is off the charts. It's a tiny space, but thoughtful design and decoration actually make it feel quite large -- and definitely homey. Have you ever been to a rental that has deluxe (sharp!) knives in the kitchen?! From the collection of gourmet teas, coffees + snacks to the ultra comfy bed with rolling storage underneath to the thoughtful book selection and charming artwork, I was delighted to stay here and definitely will again. Thanks, Libby
Easy all the way around and close to downtown, yet private and quiet.

Overall a cute stay! Definitely could use air conditioning - we had the windows open the entire stay but when it’s 90+ outside it never quite cooled off enough to be comfortable. Also the outdoor area/yard surrounding the cabin could use some sprucing and picking up. There’s old metal and wood being stored there as well as a run down workshop and if this was picked up and made to look more cozy, it would add to the experience more. Location to town was great and loved being on the creek.
Libby was very gracious and the land is lovely.

Absolutely perfect place for us! Exactly as delightful as described by the many other 5 star reviewers who've enjoyed Maebunny's.
Billie and Pippy, the small and the tall, are the friendliest dogs ever, but never pests. The shack had everything we needed and nothing we didn't, supremely clean, and the almost magical location: literally 5 minutes from downtown Durango, yet nestled within trees, birds, butterflies, with the sound of the water in the creek running behind the shack. Cars passing on the road mere whispers. The deep country experience just minutes from food, drink, rafting, etc.
Libby was low-key and friendly, responded to questions immediately, couldn't ask for a better host. We left a personal item behind and she was kind enough to mail it back to us.
I'd give 10 stars if I could. Would love to return!

Check in was very easy. Instructions to find were spot on. We were greeted by 2 very sweet dogs, added plus since we left ours at home. Slept to to sound of the little creek out back. It was peaceful. Had morning coffee on the bench by the creek. It felt like we were miles away from the city, but actually we were close. We needed to get away from things for a bit and this was the place to do it!

Our stay was fantastic! The cabin was cozy and comfortable and had everything we needed. The river runs right behind the cabin and the cabin was nice and cool with just a window open. Next time we are in Durango we will definitely book this place!
Enjoyed the stay. Was clean and liked the location on the very edge of town. Felt like it was in the country. Private feel even tho it’s on their yard.

I loved this place. It was close to town (Durango) but just far enough outside of town to feel like you were in the woods. The shack is right next to a creek that was so soothing.
Libby was so friendly and helpful. I highly recommend this place for people looking for that rustic out the of the way experience.
Great location. Beautiful property. The "Shack" was clean and no surprises. Nice quiet place to rest very close to town
Great place to stay! Loved the creek! Super cozy and cool at night. Would highly recommend if you are planning a trip to Durango. 5 min from everything!

If I could give 1000 stars to Libby’s place, I would! A perfect, cozy, restful spot to stay while exploring all Durango has to offer. Libby has been so thoughtful in all the added touches in the cabin- you will want for nothing! The bed is incredibly comfortable, the cabin is spotlessly clean, and the setting is blissful. I want to spend an entire summer in this place. Highly, highly recommend and I’ll be back! Thank you, Libby!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

This place was perfect for us. It was just as described and provided plenty room. The cabin was cozy and comfortable (great bedding) with all the little touches to make our stay nice. We enjoyed the outdoor area and spent the evening in the glider by the river. Libby was very responsive at time of booking and when we checked out. I wish all stays could be this nice and easy!
Very cute and cozy spot with all the necessary amenities, we loved it!

We enjoyed our stay very much. It's a small space but has everything you need. We really enjoyed the stream and closeness to nature while also being very close to town. A real bargain for the money. Would highly recommend.
Super host with a great location to downtown Durango… A wonderful place to decompress and enjoy the rushing sound of the creek at the back of the property… Ideal for one or two people…

This is a wonderful place in a beautiful setting with a little bench by the creek with great views! An excellent host!
A lot of little extras and a personal touch. I would definitely return and recommend it!
What a gem! Cozy, simple , and all you need! Loved the creek on the property…just amazing to listen to as you fall asleep. Found my go-to spot when I’m traveling through Durango. Done deal!

This was our favorite Airbnb during our road trip! Although it was the tiniest place we stayed, it was the most accommodating and the best! The small size made it so cozy, and was very well put together! This one had everything we needed, from TV, music, a small stove and dishes, and lots of extra special touches that made our stay very comfortable. The sound of the stream was magnificent and the location was perfect and super close to downtown Durango! It was a perfect start for our road trip, and we would love to stay again!

if you're traveling solo or with a partner this is the place to stay while you're in Durango. it was perfect! the cabin is beautiful, the back yard is wonderful with a stream running through it and the canine greeters were super friendly.
Cute little cabin in a perfect location
Great, unique spot in Durango and easy drive to Mesa Verde. Would recommend if you're in the area!
Great little place to take a break on a roadtrip. The river lulled me to sleep, great hiking trails just down the road and quick access to Durango. Would be a lovely base to explore more of the area.

We enjoyed the easy access location to trails (right across the road) and to town. The location is nice and quiet and has a beautiful creek flowing right by the cabin. While small, we had no trouble making meals in the cabin when we wished to. The bed was very comfortable. We so appreciate Airbnb's that allow dogs - thank you for that! It worked extremely well for me to take part in the bike races I was there for and my wife to hike with our dog, and access to town was very quick.

Cute little place! It was perfect for what I needed it for. I would come back and stay 😊 the little kitchen area was cute. I didn’t arrive until almost 1 am since I was driving from out of state and I was able to find the place in the dark since they were kind enough to leave the front porch light on. Thank you!

Such a great place to stay! Right in Durango but still felt private and in nature. So nice to sleep to the sound of rushing water! Great and cute place that has everything you need for an affordable price.
Was such a great location! So close to sailing hawks and turtle lake for bouldering which is what we came for! The shack had everything we needed and Billie and pippy (the dogs) were so cute!!!
This is the cutest place! I had the best time there; it’s so beautiful right by a stream and I wish I could have stayed longer! It’s perfect for one or two people traveling through Durango.
Enchanted spot
Wonderful little oasis.
great little cabin by the stream. it's next to the owners house but still feels secluded and peaceful. just keep in mind that it is a small cabin.

The exterior looks very rustic in the photos but the interior is very clean and cozy. Somehow, in that small space is a full usable kitchen and bathroom and comfy large bed and a small table with two chairs. Loved the creek right behind the cabin. Perfect white noise for falling asleep.

MaeBunnys shack was a great place to stay. I loved that it backed up to a beautiful serene creek. And the dogs on the property were so cute! Bring your own blackout curtains though because the traffic lights up the space like the 4th of July!

Great place to stay for a quick weekend in Durango. The listing would appear that the shack is more secluded which is not the case. Building is about 30 ft from the main house and right next to the solar panels. Still a nice quaint stay.

Overall exactly what my partner and I needed for a night stay in Durango. There were helpful sticky notes around the space with helpful information that I appreciated being right there, as opposed to in the Airbnb app inside home instructions/rules. Bonus was the treehouse and being right next to the river. That being said, you can hear the river pretty well from inside as an fyi.

We were blown away with how cute and well-thought out this little cabin is. In a great part of town. Really the prettiest place I've seen in ages. I would love to stay there long term! A steal for the price. Thank you!
Super cute place convenient to everything Durango has to offer. Will definitely be back and highly recommend.

This was another great stay. It was quick, especially with the crazy winter weather coming in. The tiny home was more than cozy in the cold. Great updates, and so comfortable and quiet. Perfect for a quick stop through Durango, hopefully next time we can stay longer. The snow was deep, but we were able to get in and out with zero problems.
The shack was absolutely beautiful and very peaceful. It was very clean and comfortable!

The place was exactly as described. Cozy, but with all the essentials, and it was the perfect size for two people and a dog for a weekend trip! Finding the driveway can be a little tricky especially in the dark, but the instructions provided were very helpful. The place is only around 7 minutes from downtown Durango. Would happily stay here again next time we are in town!

MaeBunny is a perfect Durango get away! It’s cozy, has all the amenities you need, and it’s close to some of the best hiking in the San Juan mountains. It’s also just a hop and a skip to downtown, but out of the hustle and bustle.

Such a wonderful experience! The cabin was literally a 5min drive from downtown Durango, but still felt nice and secluded. I stayed here in the middle of winter during multiple snow storms, and the cabin was nice and warm the whole time. My family staying in town were all jealous of how great and cozy my place was, compared to theirs! Definitely recommend staying here.
Thank you for hosting us!! The dogs absolutely loved playing in the snow and we very much appreciated the arrangements!
Libby’s place was great. Very clean, cute and with all the conveniences. The location was also perfect - close to downtown Durango but not in the bustle of things. We had a great stay.
I adore Maebunny’s Shack. It’s a home away from home. Ideal Durango location. Simple, functional, cared for, responsive host, everything you need.
This tiny home worked out well for our stay. The location was so convenient

This is the perfect Durango stay. Feels like you’re out in the country but you’re just a hop, skip and jump from town. Extremely cozy and outfitted with everything you need for a comfortable stay. We loved that the cabin heats up very quickly when it’s cold. Very well appointed with so many extra touches provided, especially in the kitchen. We will definitely be back. 5 stars all the way.

We loved the MaeBunny Shack!! It was so cozy and very cutely decorated. They left plenty of detailed instructions and made check in and chexk out easy! I would easily stay here again and recommend to anyone staying in Durango!
Great stay in a very cozy and quiet cabin. I would recommend to anyone staying in Durango.
Great place to stay at such an affordable price! Full of character and charm, comfy and cozy, neat and clean!
What a cozy place for two. couldn't beat the sweetness, cleanliness, and proximity to town and trails. Definitely a rebook for our next visit!
Had a great stay at this cozy little place. We didn’t get to stay long, but it was perfect for what we were looking for! The heaters were great with the chilly weather.
Great little place, close to town.

2nd stay here and there will be a 3rd, 4th, etc. Such a lovely tiny space that makes amazing use of every nook & cranny but does not feel cramped. Clean, comfy and has EVERYTHING you need. Beautiful surroundings in an excellent location. Libby is just an amazing host!

My husband and I COMPLETELY LOVED Mae Bunny’s Shack!!!
For such a small space, every inch is well utilized. (Roller storage under bed, solid grab bars by toilet, spaces and hooks to store things…
They thought of everything you’d need!
Beautiful area- comfortable bed

Cute, clean, warm little cabin. It was the perfect respite for us after camping in the rain for a few days. The place was very clean, had all the essentials and nice touches of complementary items. There is a fairly busy road right next to the property but the traffic noise was not bad inside the cabin. The location is great, little outside of the main part of town so quieter but a quick drive to everything Durango has to offer.
Wonderful, quiet, and cozy. More than we expected. We will be back again.
It was an adorable place and she responded immediately about our last minute stay request. Definitely recommend

This was a perfect location for us. The space is just right for 2 people and a small pup. Everything was clean and all of the nice added amenities were just what we needed. We would definitely stay again.

The MaeBunny shack was the coziest place I've ever stayed. It was well equipped with everything you might need for cooking, cleaning, and relaxing on a Durango vacation. The location is beautiful and private while remaining a quick drive from town. The MaeBunny shack truly gave us our own private slice of Durango. I am so excited to visit again.
The accommodation was very clean and cosy. It is equipped with many features that we didn't use but others would certainly enjoy.

This was such an adorable little cabin! The bed was cozy, the kitchen was big enough to cook & the outdoor space was so peaceful. We loved how close it was to trails & to town! Thank you for everything.
We absolutely loved staying at Libby’s place. It was quiet and comfortable. The location was amazing, just a few minutes from downtown!
Convenient location. Great extra touches. Very clean.

Very cute and comfortable, perfect space for myself and my two pups. Libby was very responsive and helpful giving me several recommendations for outdoor activities in the area. Great location for hiking, very peaceful and quiet which was a nice getaway!
Cute place, and loved the bench by the creek.
Great little gem

This was such a great spot! I would absolutely stay here again next time I’m in Durango. Super clean and cozy, and conveniently located from town. The kitchen had the basics for cooking a simple meal and the tea and snacks were a nice touch.

It is pretty close quarters, so it’s definitely best suited for folks that plan to be out and about during the day rather than those who want to spend a lot of time at the cabin, though there is some outdoor space as well.

The Maebunny Shack was the cutest little thing and perfect for what we needed. Nice and clean with a ton of amenities. Libby was awesome and responsive. The location is great, everything is fairly close. The shack was overall a wonderful stay and would love to come back again.

This place was really cozy and comfortable. We were so tired after a long day riding the Durango-Silverton train (which I highly recommend!!) We slept well and it was very near the downtown area. It was a great value and I would def stay there again if we are ever back in the area!
The cutest little shack and such a convenient location. Loved it!
was a great stay!

The creative layout made the small space very functional. The natural landscaping around the "shack" was lovely, and the creek in the back was a wonderful bonus. I wish I had been able to stay the full time I had booked, but Libby was very accommodating in changing my departure date. Thank you for a nice little place to stay in Durango!

Perfect little spot to rest and unwind. Location is close to town and seriously across the street from a network of hiking trails (love that!). The space had everything we needed for our 3 night stay.

Sweet little cabin in a great location to town and trails. Clean and comfortable- an added bonus was the creek behind the cabin. Coffee/tea bar and snacks were provided and appreciated. We, and our pups enjoyed everything about our stay. Thanks Libby!
Cozy place with everything we needed for our overnight stay in Durango. Close to town, but even closer to great hiking! Easy check-in and good communication. Recommended!
Loved this little shack. It’s secluded and comfy but still close to town. Perfect for a weekend in Durango!
A really great stay!

Magical place! Immaculate - so much appreciated after a journey. Cheerful, comfy and so well stocked with a number of organic and useful items. Nestled in the trees with a backyard stream complete with meditation bench and yet so close to old town Durango - a perfect stay!
Perfect getaway by a creek.

Rustic, simple and comfy are the best words to describe MaeBunny's Shack. So close to town, yet it felt so far away - nicely tucked into the woods. One nice bonus was that the Colorado Trail trailhead was just a short drive up the road - a nice hike with a spectacular view!
Passing through and this worked for what we needed for the night.
Great spot!
I highly enjoyed my stay. The location is close to town and hiking trails. The home is comfortable and clean. Im glad i found this place. I was perfect for me and my fur baby.
lovely place to stay as always!! second time back, we always have such a comfortable nice time staying in this cozy little airbnb, truly a cozy and comfortable place to stay!!
Quick easy quirky responsive and hospitable. Lovely all around.

Shack was a little creepy at night, but super cute inside and cleverly laid out (ei shower pod). I appreciated the ease of entry. You can tell a lot of care and thought was put into the amenities and information Libby provides. Stephanie was very responsive and flexible with our check out. Got some great and much needed rest during our short stay :)

Great location, not too far from town. Shower is amazing. Bed slept great. We had the windows open at night with the fan going and it was a great temperature. No ac is needed! Kind of a fun funky little place to stay. We enjoyed it!
Libby’s place was great! It was a perfect place to settle in Durango.
Great spot. Close to town. Clean and had all necessary amenities
Beautiful place! Perfect for single or a couple on travel. Close to trails, downtown and hot springs.

We will definitely be back! Always a plus when we find a listing that is pet friendly. Thank you, Libby!
Amazing spot for 2 and a dog. Bed is amazing!
This was perfect for us! Will come back next time!!

Cute little getaway outside of town that I'd recommend if you are looking for a place to crash. But it surprisingly has a large kitchen and other amenities. I wish we had time to explore the nearby hiking trails that I've heard rave reviews about.

The Maebunny Shack is a total gem! Libby has put so much heart into the shack that you will not leave! The Maebunny is super clean, has a comfy bed, a small kitchen and bathroom. This was such a beautiful place to stay. Junction Creek is a special spot in Durango, and the cabin on Libby's property is really a special spot, too! I highly recommend staying here whether you're from out of town, or you live nearby and you need a little getaway.
So quaint and adorable! Clean, thoughtful, and so well decorated and organized. Would highly recommend!
Absolutely fabulous little place! Rustic on the outside and a resort room on the inside. Clean, comfy and stocked with EVERYTHING you could need. Can't wait to come back!!

Just as advertised, great suite, close to Durango, and if you have a dog, even better. The house is small, but great for a couple, grill and kitchen super equipped. Super comfortable bed, sweet little slice of heaven! Great host!
it's so unassuming from the outside but cozy and clean on the inside.

This is a cute little spot. Well appointed with most things you may have forgotten or may need to have a pleasant stay - tea, sunscreen, etc. down the road from open space and trailheads, adjacent to the creek.
This is a great place to stay!

Don’t hesitate just book! Libby’s place was the perfect location for everything we wanted to do in Durango! Close to the fitness center, hiking, restaurants, so much to explore not enough time. Thanks for letting us stay! Look forward to coming back!

This place is a slice of heaven. Tiny, cozy and clean, creek in back for dogs to play. Nothing fancy about this house but that is exactly what I loved about it, felt like a cabin! Bed is super comfortable, and everything you need to cook is in kitchen. Bonus is Libby the owner is super inviting and fun, fun to chat with over an evening beer, and her dogs are adorable. Can’t wait to stay here in future!
Super cozy and welcoming!! 10/10 would stay again!
We loved Maebunny’s!! Super close to town but still feels in the country. We enjoyed the bbq and dinner by the creek with some adorable K9 visitors!! We would definitely stay there again.

Cute place for a good price. about 2 miles from Central Durango, so you could potentially walk from this location if you want to (only about 0.2 miles have no sidewalk). The place has a great outdoor space with a bench and hammock near a stream. The shack makes good use of the small amount of space. There is no AC so it can get a bit warm, but opening the windows helped a lot with airflow.
Wonderful stay in a convenient location!

One of the most comfortable stays at Airbnb that we have had! We loved how our host provided everything we needed during our stay, and also provided snacks. The location is super close to Durango, and worked great for our trip. Don’t be scared of the size, we found that the space have everything that we needed and we actually preferred to the size. We would definitely rebook.
The shack was our favorite option for Durango. The place is small but the land and river sounds make this a real relaxing experience!
Cozy cabin just outside of downtown. Everything you need, and nothing more!

Loved staying at Maebunny shack. I loved the location and the creek behind the property was very nice and calming. As a female solo traveler I felt very safe there. The shack was just enough room for me and my dog. I would definitely stay here again. I really enjoyed my time there.

For those who are looking for a beautiful, peaceful, rustic setting (secluded, babbling brook behind the "shack"), fun and quirky (not the typical "cookie cutter" sterile hotel room), comfortable with all the amenities we needed (coffee, snacks, plates, kitchen, a Weber BBQ outside, etc.), nicely decorated, WiFi, and plenty of power outlets throughout - this is it. It was just the right size for my wife and I and quite comfortable. I suspect that staying here will be one of the wonderful memories from our trip through Utah and Colorado.
Great shack close to downtown
Libby was a great host. I would highly recommend MaeBunny’s shack.
Such a fun place - nicest shack I've ever seen! Beautiful location near river - close to road but it did not seem to have a ton of traffic.

MaeBunny was just as described and perfectly fit our needs for a two night stay while in Durango. The location was great; less than 10 min to main street and a skip away from the Colorado Trail, trailhead!
Communication was just right and check in was easy. The "shack" was clean and included several thoughtful amenities.
We greatly appreciated that pets are allowed too.
We will definitely book again if in the area. Five star, thank you!
the tiny home was super clean, very comfortable and very well equipped. I woud stay there again for sure.

Adorable and quaint little place! It’s small but has everything you need and is located next to a peaceful creek. Bed was super comfortable and my pups loved the space to play outside with Libby’s dog! Close enough to town. Would recommend!

I loved staying here! It was perfect distance from town. Very restful and relaxing. During my stay, the creek behind the property was flowing and it made for a lovely environment. I would highly recommend staying here on your trip to the area!
This was our second time staying at Libby’s cabin and once again it was just what we were looking for during our short stay in Durango. Great location close to town but off the beaten path.

Libby's place exceeded our expectations! The sweet little space is used super efficiently, it honestly feels bigger inside. Super easy to find and get to, with a lovely creek on a beautiful piece of land. We only wish we could have stayed one more night. Super worth the price, and we will definitely book again next visit!
Great experience! Great location! I loved hiking with my dog on the nearby trails.

If you can catch a time when MaeBunny is available, you need to "hop" to it!! It's a nature lover's haven, and Libby takes care of the smallest details for your stay. Clean, comfy, cozy and you'll never forget your visit here!!!
Great stay

Lovely space. Well appointed with everything you’ll need for a short or longer stay. The extra touches like coffee, 1/2 and 1/2, and an assortment of books was great. Comfy bed and pillows. Thanks for sharing your space!
I loved my stay at the shack. It's clean, cozy, the kitchen is well equipped, and the bed is very comfortable. I also loved the serenity of hearing the stream nearby. I would love to stay again.
Nice idea to convert a "shack" into a small suite. Space enough for a few night stay and well equipped and new clean bathroom.

This is an adorable little tiny cottage for one (or for a VERY cozy couple, perhaps). Even though it's in the backyard of the home, it felt very private and the creek was lovely to have as ambient noise. Great location for Durango.
This place was wonderful! It was exactly what I needed. The location is perfect!
Small is better for some people but this is small.

Awesome place to stay! The place is so cute and has many warm welcoming personal touches! It is small, but well designed and exceptionally clean. Everything we needed and more! The location is perfect if you plan to do anything in Durango. Would reccomend 100%!!

We unfortunately had to cancel our trip very last minute due to some life circumstances. While we didn't get to see this awesome spot, Libby was kind and a fast communicator throughout the whole process.
Easy to find, great location, cute spot!
Great location, cute place. Highly recommend
Super cute tiny spot that met all our needs for an overnight stay. Easy check in. Close to town. Even closer to hiking trails. Hosts provided coffee, tea and snacks which was thoughtful.
Great place and value. Listening to the creek behind the shack is nice.

Everything was just the best ever.
You’ll just have to try for Your self. Jacqueline is a wonderfull hostess

This was exactly what we expected. The bathroom has been updated to a porta-loo since the listing was created, which was a welcome improvement. If you stay here when it's cold at night just make sure you turn that space heater on asap! I unfortunately waited too long and was uncomfortable for longer than I needed to be. I arrived late at night and my son was already asleep so I didn't get to settle in before putting him in bed, and it was hard for me to find the heater under the circumstance. With that said, I do NOT recommend staying here if you might be arriving late at night. This is ideally a place you want to adapt to before night falls (like when you go camping!). All in all, I appreciated the accomodations and would certainly stay here again.
In a beautiful location near horses and sweet animals. The yurt was the perfect home base for our inspiring and grounding weekend!

This place was really great for our family of 4 plus 1 doggo! I feel the need to tell every detail because we enjoyed it so much. First, the communication as outstanding. The day before we arrived, I asked if there was a grill. The property manager said he'd bring one over. There was a new grill waiting for us with grill utensils when we arrived. We were also sent exact coordinations to the house, but found it easily with the address. The house has a small fenced in back years that was perfect for our doggo. There is also what looks to be a garden in the summer that fascinated our 4 and 2 year olds. We'd love to come back when it's warmer and utilize fresh herbs or veggies! the bed was very comfortable with plenty of pillows. There was a small heater in the bedroom that warmed the space well, as it did get chilly at night! In the living room, there is a fireplace that I assume was gas. Very simple to turn on and off with a remote, and kept the whole cabin toasty. The kitchen was a small and efficient space, with a gas stove (which I love and prefer). We have young kids, so we really appreciated the sturdy and solid furniture, which was a beautiful wood. There were some really great touches in the cabin, including games, like Connect 4, several books, and, my husband's favorite, an arcade game with pac-man, Gallagher, dig out and others. There is also a washing machine that is a washer/dryer combo, which, to this point, I've only seen in Europe and South America. The space was very clean! Even my extremely picky husband commented on how clean it was. There was a locked closet that I assume had cleaning supplies in it, but we didn't have access, so if you want to clean up after yourself, plan to bring some disinfectant wipes. There is a really great deck on the front to enjoy the beautiful mountain scenery. While other houses are close by, the cabin does sit on a quiet back dirt road that was so nice to let the kids run on, and walk Teddy Roosevelt (the dog). As discussed in the description, you are exactly 12 miles to town, and apparently about the same to Purgatory, as the other rental property looked to have winter sporters staying. Easily a 5 star stay. My husband travels to Durango several times a year for work, and this will likely be our go-to whenever it's available!
