The perfect spot! We got super lucky finding Sarah’s place last minute - so grateful we did! After sleeping in the comfy king bed and making breakfast in the morning in the well stocked kitchen, we stepped out onto the deck to gaze at the red rock cliffs and just said, “Ahhhh…”
Although minutes from town, it has the feeling of being away from it all. The hot tub is nice and hot and we really enjoyed spending time on the deck.
Great as a couple’s getaway and great for families, you won’t be disappointed staying here! Sarah provided some lovely touches like local goodies and recommendations. If I could give 6 stars I would.

Wowzer! This place is amazing. We got to see deer our first night. The hot tub, games, nice deck off the back, location, and pantry with extras was just what my guy and I needed. Sarah kept in communication to make sure our visit was good. I personally loved the chickens too. I will defiantly come back here and stay again.
This host went above and beyond! Amazing home, property, location! Highly recommend this home for your stay!

An authentic Southern Colorado experience. Private and beautiful. It was more than we expected. Sarah was a gracious host and the apartment served as an ideal home base for exploring Durango, Mesa Verde and Canyons of the Ancients.
We enjoyed our stay!

This house was a perfect spot for exploring Durango, Purgatory, and all of the wonderful areas around the San Luis Valley. We enjoyed the hot tub each night and built a fire almost every night. Sarah provided lots of extras which made our stay special.
Great place to stay. Beautiful home and wonderful host.
Wonderful place to stay, plenty of room. Clean and conveniently located to downtown and the mountain. Sarah was a wonderful host!!
Great location central to the town of Durango and only a short drive to the mountain.
Great place! Would 100% stay again

overall, this is a great place to stay at. no major complaints whatsoever. At one point, there was an item that needed immediate attention and the host was pretty responsive and took care of it right away. The house itself had everything we needed. I really liked the fact that the pantry already came with some leftover items such as ketchup, cooking spices and cooking oil, this made cooking handy (as I had forgotten to buy these). I loved the location of this place, close enough to downtown durang, like 10 or 15 min but far away to get the feeling of the countryside. I was really comfortable asking the host for recommendations or any tourist question icould think of. I would definitely stay here again. thanks for hosting us.
Everything was so wonderful and Sarah was an amazing host! I would recommend to anyone looking for a perfect stay on Durango!

We can echo other reviews, Sarah was a very generous and very responsive host! The property was beautiful and the location was great!!! She is very thorough and thoughtful! So many special touches makes the stay seem even more special! Everything about our trip was lovely and smooth, partly due to Sarah’s help with suggestions and answering so many questions about Durango!
The space is warm and inviting, and our big family had plenty of room!! We are ready to come back!!
Very nice house in a good area. Sarah is very responsive and helpful. Great stay all around.
Beautiful place to stay. Sarah is great host. We had everything we needed and more!

We really enjoyed our stay. The place was clean and Sarah was friendly, helpful and responsive. A lot of extra nice touches which we appreciated and things were as described. Would definitely recommend.

This is an excellent stay especially if you have kids. Sarah was a wonderful host and went out of her way to ensure our infant and toddler were well taken care of. It is in the perfect location, not in the hustle and bustle of downtown, but not far from town and not far from Purgatory. Highly recommend. Plus there were a bunch of bonuses like beer in the fridge and mugs in the freezer. 10/10

A lovely spot, with easy access to downtown Durango, and Purgatory. Sarah provides excellent communication, adds thoughtful touches (like a creative, fun scavenger hunt for kiddos, local handmade soaps, and adult beverages for the big kids), and has great suggestions for in and around Durango. Comfortable bed, well stocked kitchen, and the hot tub is a luxurious bonus!

Sarah our host is absolutely a SUPER HOST!! She was very communicative throughout the whole process of booking, during our stay and after check out. Our stay started off with a cute scavenger hunt for the kids and a complementary s’mores kit, tea and chocolate from local stores. Sarah’s husband personally woke up each morning and shoveled snow off the drive way and scrapped ice off our cars for us knowing that we had plans to go out on the town during our stay! BBQ propane was out when we were there but they quickly came to ensure we had what we need. We love how clean, organized, and comforting the home was. The home is certainly fully stocked with supplies and responsive communication was very much appreciated! I love how clean and organized the home was. Views from the home was impeccable and heating throughout kept the home warm for us. We definitely would return again :).

Wonderful home close to downtown Durango, and about 30 min from Purgatory. The house was really nice, the views were beautiful & Sarah is a great host! I’d recommend renting a car as Ubers and cabs are really hard to come by. But the place is amazing!!! Highly recommend.
Beyond our expectations!

My wife, 10 year old son & I stayed at Sarah's place & absolutely loved it. The hot tub was great, the kitchen was great, the family foosball tournament was great. Durango was the perfect winter vacation for us & Sarah's place couldn't have suited us better.

This cozy cabin was the perfect place to stay while visiting Durango. Minutes from town but quiet and tranquil, everything was clean and welcoming for our stay. Excellent communication from Sarah, and some great recommendations on things do to! We will definitely be back next time we come to Durango.
Very nice and considerate. Enjoyed the stars and the quiet.

This was by far one of our favorite Airbnb’s! The house was clean, and well furnished the home gave everyone the space they needed to feel at home! The view was amazing in the mountains & close to town!

We absolutely loved this house! Awesome location, great hikes nearby, Stargazing from the hot tub and close to downtown. Sarah was very helpful with suggestions and quick to communicate. We also loved getting fresh eggs from Sarah’s chickens. Thanks for an awesome stay!

This place is a perfect get away. Just close enough to town, but just far enough away to be alone. Very close to the airport as we flew in at midnight and had no problem finding the place. Sarah your host, will have the light on and the house heated before you arrive if you ask her to. The master bed, lined in wood logs, was incredibly comfortable and located right off the kitchen and on the same level as the hot tub. Downstairs was the foosball table and Net-flicks on TV. Full kitchen so we cooked almost every night, breakfast every morning and made sandwiches each day for our trips out to adventure. We will definitely be back and will bring others with us! Top notch place!!!

Stayed here with 3 friends for a relaxing long weekend. We loved the hot tub & comfy & clean accommodations. Really appreciated the location between the town of Durango & the hotsprings. Very convenient with a car. Quiet & peaceful.
Great host and a wonderful location! I highly recommend for a great relaxing getaway.

Rent this home !!!! Make no plans and spend a week in a luxurious home with a lovely host and stunning Colorado views from every window. The back yard is a vacation destination in itself!! The pictures do this no justice. Plenty of delicious food locally , close to everything. Mesa verde was so much more than I expected and I felt rivaled Yellowstone and RNP (I have vacationed in both). Do yourself a favor and research the native history, put some flute music on your playlist and sit in that hot tub looking at that view and any worry in life you ever had will
Melt away❤️❤️. Perfect post covid reboot !!!! Ps although we did not travel with kids this time this home would be very welcoming to a family. There is a ton of things to do close to this home if you so choose but be pre -warned :you won’t want to leave the yard !
Great place in a beautiful location! Easy to get to town, but far enough to get away from it all. Really enjoyed this place and will be booking again if it’s available!

A hidden gem! Close enough to Durango for easy access but remote enough to enjoy the quiet days and starry nights. Spacious accommodations with a delightful kitchen/dining and deck area. We loved our time here and can’t wait to return next year.

The host was excellent and the property is great. I’m the owner of my own Airnb property and have high expectations. Her house checked all the boxes for my family. We would definitely book her property again if we’re in the area.
I loved all the small details that Sarah provided: drinks, chocolate, eggs, and more. Sarah and the Woodshop are amazing.
We had a great experience staying here for the week. The location is quiet and it’s a quick drive into town. Great views of the valley and nice amenities.

This was a magical place! Sarah went above-and-beyond to personalize the experience, sprinkling local flavors of Durango. It was wonderful to unwind here after long days of exploration. The place felt quiet and exclusive. We would absolutely recommend it. 😊

Do not book this cabin until you understand there is no privacy (several cabins in close proximity) and the location is sandwiched between private property and the highway - so you have to get in your car to do anything - ride bikes, walk or go for a run.
With no AC, it gets very hot in the summer months and some windows were missing screens and other windows cannot open so limited ability for fresh air into the cabin. An extremely small fan was in a closet, but way too small to allow for any relief of the heat. Very disappointing and we did not stay. We rebooked immediately and found an amazing site just a few miles away. As of this posting, I have not received any refund since Vita seems to think it’s up to Airbnb to decide this.
